attributes.action: Abolish all public pensions and redistribute to all pensioners to at least double the OAP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have recently seen the cabinet back down very feebly from 'demanding' that public employees should lose the right to retire at 60. Then we have the announcement that the rest of the population have now to work and pay taxes to at least 68 (in order to feed those who can't envisage toil after 60). We also have the relaxation of health care regulation to help us work 'til we drop.What of quality of life, of seeing our grandchildren grow up?Scrap all public pensions:let all contribute to their own 'market place' funds:double the o.a.p.:allow all to work as long as they wish after 60.All the ills of the public sector can be linked to its huge pension black hole.Is a cleaner in the town hall worth double one in an old folk's home?
